paper_keywords: Libby and Novick's generalized beta distribution
paper_abstract: A new family of skewed distributions is presented. Some properties and estimation procedures for Libby and Novick's generalized beta exponential distribution, a particular member of the family, are derived. Real applications using two original data sets are described to show superior performance versus at least six known models.
paper_title: Libby and Novick's generalized beta exponential distribution
